Entries.Andy_Text: I'm lookin' to have a cellar built under my house for preserve jars. Anyone kind enough to help me out?
Entries.Andy_Objective_1_Text: Add wood to Andy's chest in his room.
Entries.Andy_Objective_2_Text: Add hardwood to Andy's chest in his room.
Entries.Andy_Objective_3_Text: Add stone to Andy's chest in his room.
Entries.Andy_Objective_4_Text: Add iron bars to Andy's chest in his room.

Entries.5407915/e 5404269/n AndyCellar: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 13 17 1 Andy 18 15 0/pause 1000/viewport 12 16 true/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 750/faceDirection Andy 3 true/pause 300/speak Andy "Ah, @. Just who I wanted to see!$0#$b#I finally got myself a cellar thanks to you. Why don't ya come take a gander at it?$1"/pause 350/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound stairsdown/changeLocation Custom_AndyCellar/playSound stairsdown/pause 500/warp farmer 8 5/warp Andy 6 5/faceDirection farmer 2 true/faceDirection Andy 2 true/viewport 7 7 true/pause 1800/emote farmer 16 true/pause 1250/speak Andy "I expect I'll be makin' more income thanks to these here preserve jars.$0#$b#Spent every cent I had on this project. Hope it'll be worth the trouble.$0"/pause 750/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/speak Andy "As a way of sayin' thanks, I wanna give you my special strawberry jam recipe!$0#$b#Jus' promise me you'll keep this to yourself and put it to good use.$1"/pause 500/move Andy 1 0 1/pause 400/shake Andy 500/showFrame Andy 37/pause 250/playSound newRecipe/showFrame Andy 38/pause 500/showFrame Andy 37 true/pause 200/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 300/playSound reward/message "I received Andy's strawberry jam recipe! Strawberries are now worth 25 percent more!"/pause 250/emote farmer 32 true/pause 500/friendship Andy 250/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/end dialogue Andy "Can't believe I got myself a cellar!$1#$e#You makin' strawberry jam anytime soon, farmer?$0#$b#With my recipe, folks will pay a lot more!$1"

Entries.Olivia_Text: I wish to host a reception for prestigious guests and friends at the town square. Are there any local farmers who could provide some high-end groceries?       -Olivia
Entries.Olivia_Objective_1_Text: Add starfruit wine to Olivia's cabinet in her cellar.
Entries.Olivia_Objective_2_Text: Add cheese to Olivia's cabinet in her cellar.
Entries.Olivia_Objective_3_Text: Add goat cheese to Olivia's cabinet in her cellar.

Entries.Susan_Text: I'm in the market to purchase some freshly-made quality fertilizer. My babies need the extra nutrients!
Entries.Susan_Objective_1_Text: Drop off quality fertilizer at Susan's chest.

Entries.Sophia_Text: Ever since I was a little girl, I've wanted my own fairy rose garden. Can anyone help me?
Entries.Sophia_Objective_1_Text: Drop off fairy seeds at Sophia's chest.

Entries.5407918/e 5515272/n SophiaFairyGarden/w: none/-500 -500/Sophia 16 24 0 Scarlett 15 24 0 Pierre 24 55 2 Caroline 25 55 2/pause 500/playMusic playful/pause 500/viewport 16 25 clamp true/pause 1750/jump Sophia/pause 1000/jump Sophia/pause 300/faceDirection Scarlett 1 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Sophia 3 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "So, Scarlett! What do you think about my 'fairy garden'?$9"/pause 500/speak Scarlett "The flowers smell really nice. It's all super pretty!$0#$b#I think this spot will make for great cosplay pictures!$1"/pause 400/speak Sophia "You said it!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 500/end dialogue Sophia "Hey! Thank you so, so much for helping me build my garden. I'll pay you back somehow!$1"

Entries.5407919/e 5515272: continue/-500 -500/Sophia -20 -20 0 farmer -20 -20 0/pause 1100/speak Sophia "Hey, you. Um. I just wanted to say I'm really grateful for my fairy garden. I love it so much!$1#$b#To pay you back, I contracted with a new sprinkler supplier. You can purchase new devices from my ledger now.$9"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playSound reward/message "I can now purchase iridium sprinklers and nozzles from Sophia's ledger in her cosplay room!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "The iridium sprinklers and nozzles are really expensive... but I'm selling them at cost.$0#$e#I know they'll help out with your farming work, silly.$1"

Entries.5407918/e 5515272/n SophiaFairyGarden/w: none/-500 -500/Sophia -10 -10 0 farmer -10 -10 0/pause 2000/speak Sophia "Good morning, silly!$9#$b#My fairy garden should be completed today! Drop by the vineyard sometime this afternoon if you want to see it.$1"/pause 500/end dialogue Sophia "Fairy garden! Yay!$9#$e#%Sophia can't contain her excitement."

Entries.5407919/e 5515272/e 5407918/z winter/t 1: none/-500 -500/Sophia 15 24 0 farmer 16 24 0 Pierre 24 55 2 Caroline 25 55 2/pause 500/playMusic kindadumbautumn/pause 500/positionOffset Sophia 7 -7/viewport 16 25 clamp true/pause 1750/jump Sophia/pause 800/jump Sophia/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 900/faceDirection Sophia 1 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "I love it! Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!$9#$b#Come here, you!$4"/pause 600/showFrame farmer 101 true/showFrame Sophia 28 true/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite heart 16 23/pause 2000/move farmer 0 0 3/showFrame Sophia 4 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "I've dreamt about having a fairy garden ever since I was a little girl and first watched 'Pink Princess Crusaders'.$4#$b#You made my dream come true, for real!$9"/pause 600/showFrame farmer 97 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 400/speak Sophia "Um. I was going to keep this a secret, but I want to tell you now.$1#$b#There's some new devices you can purchase from my order ledger!$9#$b#They're really expensive though, and I won't make money from selling them...$2#$b#But I know you'll put them to good use!$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/speak Sophia "Let's enjoy the garden for a little longer, silly...$4"/pause 800/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 750/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 750/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/pause 600/emote Sophia 20/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1000/playSound reward/message "I can now purchase iridium sprinklers and nozzles from Sophia's order ledger!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "I need to invite Scarlett over soon. I just know she'll love the garden!$1#$e#It'll make for a great cosplay photoshoot spot, too!$4#$e#*hugs* I love you!$9"

Entries.MarlonFay_Text: I'm looking for someone who's adept at crafting and won't ask any questions. Job details enclosed upon acceptance.
Entries.MarlonFay_Objective_1_Text: Drop off cherry bombs at Marlon's chest.

Entries.Clint2_Text: I need these materials to craft an explosive powerful enough to destroy the boulder blocking the summit.
Entries.Clint2_Objective_1_Text: Drop off iridium ore at Clint's crate.
Entries.Clint2_Objective_2_Text: Drop off coal at Clint's crate.

Entries.8050107/t 600 1500/H: continue/-500 -500/farmer 33 26 1 Clint 45 26 0 MarlonFay 14 19 0 Susan 43 51 0/positionOffset MarlonFay 4 15/positionOffset Susan -12 -6/viewport 44 32 clamp true/viewport move 0 -1 5000 true/skippable/move farmer 10 0 1 true/pause 6250/faceDirection Clint 3 true/pause 500/speak Clint "Oh. Hi, @.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 0 true/pause 500/speak Clint "Lewis hired me to get rid of this boulder. It's gonna require an explosive that packs a punch.$0#$b#Problem is, the materials I need to make it aren't exactly easy to come by...$2"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1150/faceDirection Clint 3 true/pause 500/speak Clint "You'll help me out? That's kind of you.$0#$b#Meet me at my house. We can go over the list of materials I need.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Lewis "Ah, the summit boulder? I commissioned Clint for some of his handiwork to deal with it.$0"

Entries.8050108/e 8050107: continue/-500 -500/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 7 12 0/pause 700/viewport 8 15 true/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1300/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3 true/pause 200/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 300/emote Clint 16 true/speak Clint "Oh! Hey, @.$0#$b#Sorry. Didn't hear you over the furnace.$1"/pause 1000/move Clint 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Clint "I need coal and iridium ore to make a bomb powerful enough to destroy that boulder.$0#$b#You can drop off the materials in that crate to your right.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 500/speak Clint "Er... thanks for helping me.$0#$b#Check your journal for the specific amounts.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/emote farmer 32 true/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Clint "So uhh... how are you going to get that iridium, anyway?$0"

Entries.railroadBoulder: Er... that boulder is gone now.$0#$e#I'd check out the summit, but it's too far a climb for me.$0
The boulder removal was a success!$1#$e#Say, do you think this'll improve my public relations?$0
Since we can get to the summit now, maybe I'll start hiking again.$0
So, the summit is open?$0#$e#Would be nice to get my mind off things with a long walk.$1
Good forage can be found at the summit, @. There's plenty to go around!$0#$b#Here, I'll share some with you.[20]$1
Good forage can be found at the summit, @. There's plenty to go around!$0#$b#Here, I'll share some with you.[396]$1

Entries.Summit_11_13: Hiking has become a hobby of mine. Good workout and pretty view.$1

Entries.Summit_21_25: I wonder what her story was...$2

Entries.Summit_17_20: Nature isn't afraid of showing you her true beauty. The view up here is proof enough of that.$1

Entries.Robin3_Text: If I gather these materials, Robin will refurbish my grandpa's old shed. There's a trunk in the building where I can drop them off.

Entries.2554902/H/t 700 1500: continue/-500 -500/farmer 64 15 2 Robin 64 17 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound stoneStep/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 300/pause 800/message "Someone's knocking on the front door."/changeLocation farm/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/positionOffset farmer 0 -20/positionOffset Robin 10 -25/viewport 64 16 clamp true/pause 1000/speak Robin "Hey @!$0#$b#I'm about to check the structural integrity of that abandoned shed on your property!$0#$b#I'm licensed by the 'Ferngill Republic Building Association' to make sure abandoned buildings aren't on the verge of collapsing...$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Robin 0 true/pause 500/speak Robin "If you have a moment, you can watch my inspection progress.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_GrandpasShedRuins/warp Robin 16 7/warp farmer 16 10/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Robin 0 true/playSound doorClose/pause 600/playSound doorClose/pause 400/stopMusic/pause 200/viewport 16 9 true/pause 1700/faceDirection Robin 3 true/pause 1600/faceDirection Robin 0 true/pause 250/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 1600/faceDirection Robin 2 true/pause 1000/animate Robin false true 200 34 35/textAboveHead Robin "Hmm..."/pause 3500/stopAnimation Robin/pause 800/speak Robin "I could actually refurbish this shed if I had the materials.$0#$b#It'd be a challenge, that's for sure!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak Robin "Visit me at my workshop and we can talk more about the specifics.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 750/end dialogue Robin "Whenever you want to discuss repairing that shed, find me at my workshop.$0"

So let's get right to business.$1#$b#I'm estimating 150 pieces of hardwood, 600 pieces of stone, 50 iron bars, and 20 battery packs...$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Robin "There's a lot of rotten wood and rust. Entries.2554907: none/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 Robin 13 13 0/skippable/viewport 16 9 true/playMusic jaunty/pause 2500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 16 16/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 600/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Robin "Hey @!$1"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 700/speak Robin "So... what do you think?$0#$b#You may have seen new window panes on the roof.#$b#There's a great space to grow plants up there now."/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak Robin "I couldn't have fixed it up without all the materials you gathered.$1#$b#I actually had a lot of fun and learned some new things.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Robin 0/pause 750/speak Robin "There was some leftover hardwood, so I crafted a few casks for the heck of it!$1#$b#This bottom floor would be great for aging wine...$0"/pause 750/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 700/speak Robin "Well, enjoy the refurbished shed @!$1"/pause 500/end dialogue Robin "Oh, I almost forgot! There are some plants upstairs already, a gift from Susan. She thought you'd appreciate some plants to get your greenhouse started!$1#$e#Mmm, I wonder if she wants a greenhouse of her own?$0"

Entries.Apples_Text: A forest spirit is requesting starfruit.
Entries.Apples_Objective_1_Text: Leave starfruit on the Junimo plaque in Aurora Vineyard.

Entries.7775926/e 77759294/H: continue/-500 -500/farmer 20 53 0 Wizard -100 -100 1 Camilla -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/viewport 20 50 clamp true/viewport move 0 -1 3250/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/pause 3200/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Wizard 20 44/positionOffset Wizard 20 0/pause 450/jump farmer/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "@. Intense magic is surrounding you? What have you done?$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 400/speak Wizard "Hmm? Junimo activity in the abandoned vineyard? Most interesting.$0#$b#And what of the object you're carrying?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8 true/pause 1000/message "I feel something in my pocket..."/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 400/showFrame farmer 89 true/pause 500/playSound newRecipe/pause 200/addTemporaryActor JunimoScroll 10 11 20 46 2 false/positionOffset JunimoScroll -15 -5/pause 1500/message "What is this doing here?"/pause 1000/warp JunimoScroll -50 -50/playSound newRecipe/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "That miraculous golden scroll is enchanted with forest magic.$0#$b#...$0#$b#Please. Follow me to my abode. This will require a thorough arcane analysis.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/playSound doorClose/changeLocation WizardHouse/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 200/playSound doorClose/pause 500/warp farmer 10 19/warp Wizard 10 17/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/playMusic WizardSong/pause 1000/viewport 8 18 true/pause 1300/speak Wizard "Hand me the scroll.$0"/pause 700/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/ShowFrame farmer 15/playSound newRecipe/pause 600/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "Stand back.$0"/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 200/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/glow 0 0 255/playSound healSound/pause 1200/playSound healSound/glow 0 255 0/pause 1000/shake Wizard 1000/pause 1000/emote Wizard 12/pause 800/shake Wizard 700/glow 122 122 200/playSound healSound/pause 1500/glow 100 50 20/playSound healSound/pause 1700/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 1800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "...#$b#I'm unable to decipher the scroll.#$b#It's so faded that it's almost illegible, and my translation skills are... rusty.$0"/pause 1000/emote Wizard 40/pause 700/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "I will call a good friend for assistance.$0#$b#She excels in ancient languages.$0"/pause 700/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 1000/shake Wizard 1000/pause 1700/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "She's arriving momentarily."/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak Wizard "Ah. Who did I contact?$0#$b#The witch of-$0"/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Camilla 10 21/playMusic cm:EnchantedWaltz/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 100/jump farmer/showFrame farmer 94 true/pause 900/move farmer 0 0 2/speak Camilla "My, my. Hello there, dear.$0"/pause 200/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Camilla 8 17/faceDirection Camilla 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 300/speak Camilla "You requested my help, Razzy?$1"/speak Wizard "...#$b#This scroll. What can you make of it?$0"/pause 400/speak Camilla "Mmm?$0"/pause 600/move Camilla 1 0 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 700/showFrame Wizard 13/pause 400/showFrame Camilla 20/playSound newRecipe/pause 200/showFrame Wizard 12/pause 2000/playSound healSound/screenFlash 1/pause 600/playSound healSound/screenFlash 1/pause 1000/emote Camilla 48/pause 400/speak Camilla "The spirit who wrote this hardly understands their own language.$1#$b#It's like reading the writing of a child...I think they must be young.$0"/pause 500/showFrame Camilla 4/playSound newRecipe/pause 650/faceDirection Camilla 2 true/pause 500/speak Camilla "A 'Junimo' has taken up residence in the cellar of an abandoned building west of Cindersap Forest.$0#$b#They request 200 starfruits...$5#$b#It would seem you're on the verge of making a new friend, @.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 800/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Camilla 10 21/faceDirection Camilla 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 350/speak Camilla "You know, @...$0#$b#I could use someone with your...$0"/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Camilla 8 19/faceDirection Camilla 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 200/speak Camilla "Abilities...$5"/speak Wizard "Camilla. That's enough."/pause 250/faceDirection Camilla 0 true/pause 300/emote Camilla 12/pause 500/move Camilla 0 -2 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 400/speak Camilla "You're no fun, Razzy.$3#$b#Is that all you needed me for?$2"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Indeed. Thank you-"/speak Camilla "Adieu.$5"/faceDirection Camilla 1 true/pause 400/showFrame Camilla 17/pause 200/showFrame Camilla 18/pause 200/showFrame Camilla 19/pause 200/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/warp Camilla -300 -300/stopMusic/pause 1200/emote Wizard 40/pause 600/playMusic WizardSong/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 400/speak Wizard "...#$b#She has important matters to handle in Castle Village. Forgive her manners, @.$0"/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 600/shake Wizard 600/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/move Wizard -2 0 2/move Wizard 0 1 3 true/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 150/move Wizard -1 0 2/move Wizard 0 1 3/move Wizard -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Your connection with the Junimos is fascinating.#$b#It surpasses even mine.$0"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 700/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 400/speak Wizard "Mmm. I wonder if this is related to your deeds in the community center.$0"/pause 700/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "Do keep me updated.$0#$b#I'm quite fascinated by this turn of events.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1400/end dialogue Wizard "Hmm? You're responsible for what transpired at the community center?#$b#Ah, yes. This explains these recent events.#$e#I believe Camilla has taken a liking to you.#$b#She can sense your arcane potential."
